text: Hello! I have a question regarding of home.html.  I want to add my custom module and some section with custom html code. When I try to check the page I don't see my section with module. I receive this message 'custom widget definition not found" . Which is the problem ? Can you help me ?

A question regarding menus is there any way to do a check if the current page is included in a menu,
I have a breadcrumb on my pages which we have manually prepended with Home / but it looks weird on some pages that are not in the menu so we would like to hide this whole area on pages that are not in the main menu
